title: Bi-component sensing platform for the detection of Cd2+, Fe2+and Fe3+ ions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27153-27161
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04655B, Paper

Jagajiban Sendh, Jubaraj B. Baruah
Use of N-(1,3-dioxo-1H-benzo[de]isoquinolin-2(3H)-yl)isonicotinamide or 2,6-pyridinedicarboxylic acid individually or as a bi-component system in distinguishing and detecting cations was investigated.
